ygData.subject: RE: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: I sure hope nothing comes of this.  I joined this list to get more hints than cheats. All the hacks and cheat programs RUINED Diablo and completely unbalanced
ygData.messageBody:
I sure hope nothing comes of this. I joined this list to get more hints
than cheats.
All the hacks and cheat programs RUINED Diablo and completely unbalanced UO.
I commend Verant for the foresight it took to make alt-tabbing almost
impossible to use while running EQ.
I hope Blizzard picks up on this before they release D2.
If you want a juiced up character learn to write your own code...and go play
Quake!
If you have to cheat to have fun, maybe you should work on improving your
playing skills instead, 'cause if you can't get good gear (and experience)
in this game without cheating you REALLY suck as a player.
Oh, FYI, I feel the same way about the places where you can get monsters
'stuck' and still cast at them...I think it's great that Verant bans people
that do that crap :)
On a more cordial note, any of you beta testing Asheron's Call? I got my
invite last week put haven't played it yet.
Oh yeah - save your flames...these are just MY opinions, you're welcome to
your own :)
I KNOW this is a 'Cheats' list, but 90% of the time its really a SPOILER
list, not a 'cheat' list.
Don't forget to HAVE FUN!
Isn't that why you're PLAYING????
Sean


-----Original Message-----
From: Omeg Felligan [mailto:omeg_felligan@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 9:38 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....


From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>

Ok, does anyone remember the days of Diablo where you'd just Alt-Tab over to

your cheat program?

well, I was on ICQ the other day and I got a msg, and not thinking I
alt-tab'ed once, nothing, twice and I was out of EQ.

Now, my mouse was fairly locked up, but the key board still worked, I could
alt-tab between other programs. (only had ICQ open) when the CTRL-ALT-DEL
window came up (I pushed em) I could again use my mouse while it was up.

when I tried to go back into EQ it didn't work, but it still takes time to
camp out your character eh? :)

I'm thinking this may be able to allow some cheat programs, but probably
not, everything seems to me server side except for hot keys.

But, I am not a good enough programmer to write something that might be able

to take advantage of this, nor do I know anyone who is. If you are give
your input and see if anything works eh? hehehe...if anyone does figure
something out they'd be a god to EQ cheaters :)

hope something comes of this,
Omeg
